A data transfer object that encapsulates tool authentication credentials including username, password, and API key configurations for external tool integrations.

## Key Components

- **ToolCredentialsResponse**: Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for automatic getter/setter generation
- **username**: String field for basic authentication username
- **password**: String field for basic authentication password  
- **apiKey**: ToolApiKeyResponse object containing API key configuration details
- **Swagger annotations**: Provides API documentation with field descriptions and examples

## Usage Example

```java
// Building credentials response
ToolCredentialsResponse credentials = ToolCredentialsResponse.builder()
    .username("admin")
    .password("password123")
    .apiKey(new ToolApiKeyResponse())
    .build();

// Accessing credentials in service layer
public void authenticateWithTool(ToolCredentialsResponse credentials) {
    String user = credentials.getUsername();
    String pass = credentials.getPassword();
    ToolApiKeyResponse apiConfig = credentials.getApiKey();
    
    // Perform authentication logic
    if (user != null && pass != null) {
        // Use basic auth
    } else if (apiConfig != null) {
        // Use API key authentication
    }
}
```
